name: UwuUhu (Unknown Utopia)
description:
In the mood for a relaxing fright? I promise it won't take long! Hee hee hee... 

A mysterious figure approaches Utopias Mall, a place that has not seen much success lately.

Who is this tempting stranger, and why are they here?

Play as Alphabetus Z, the Spirit of Utopias Mall, and swing your way to answers!
